condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, I, A, 1 (a) | Description :Maintain, throughout the period of implementation of the Project, aProject Steering Committee. | Due Date :30-Jul-2010
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, I, A, 1 (b) | Description :Maintain, throughout the period of implementation of the Project, aBudget Committee. | Due Date :30-Jul-2010

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, I, A, 1 (c) | Description : Maintain throughout the period of implementation of the Project aProject Implementation Unit, headed by the recipient's Director General Customs as Project Director, and assisted by a ProjectGeneral Manager. | Due Date :30-Jun-2016
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, I, B, 1 (a) | Description :Prepare and adopt, a Project Financial Management Manual | Due Date:30-May-2010

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, I, B, 2 (a) | Description :Cause the Budget Committee to prepare and furnish to the Association, byno later than December 20th of each year, commencing on December 20, 2010, a detailed Annual Work Plan. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, II, A, 1 | Description :Recipient shall prepare Annual Project, and shall be furnished to theAssociation not later than one (1) month after the end of theperiod covered by such report. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, II, B, 2 | Description :Prepare and furnish to the Association not later than forty five (45) daysafter the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, II, B, 3 | Description :Have its Financial Statements audited each fiscal year of the Recipient, andfurnished to the Association not later than six (6) months after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly
